Room.Name: Tower Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Tower Lane, just east of the Milsene Museum.
Room.LongDescription: The entrance to the museum appears to be west of here. A tiny temple is on the north side of the road, barely coming to your chest in height. The door is open, and you can see pixies and other small creatures inside. On the south side, next door to the museum, is a research center for a dwarven mines and tunnels society.
